TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LanguageVersion extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the language version.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.LanguageVersion CSharp1 = int32(1)
CSharp1 = 1

Docs.summary: C# language version 1

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.LanguageVersion CSharp10 = int32(1000)
CSharp10 = 1000

Docs.summary:
C# language version 10.0
Features:
Record structs
Global using directives
Lambda improvements
Improved definite assignment
Constant interpolated strings
Mix declarations and variables in deconstruction
Extended property patterns
Sealed record ToString
Source Generator v2 APIs
Method-level AsyncMethodBuilder

item.description: Mix declarations and variables in deconstruction

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.LanguageVersion CSharp11 = int32(1100)
CSharp11 = 1100

Docs.summary:
C# language version 11.0
Features:
Raw string literals
Static abstract members in interfaces
Generic attributes
Newlines in interpolations
List-patterns
Required members
Span<char> constant pattern
Struct auto-default
Nameof(parameter)
Checked user-defined operators
UTF-8 string literals
Unsigned right-shift operator
Relaxed shift operator
Ref fields
File-local types

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.LanguageVersion CSharp12 = int32(1200)
CSharp12 = 1200

Docs.summary:
C# language version 12.0
Features:
Primary constructors
Using aliases for any types
Nameof accessing instance members
Inline arrays
Collection expressions
Ref readonly parameters
Lambda optional parameters

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.LanguageVersion CSharp13 = int32(1300)
CSharp13 = 1300

Docs.summary:
C# language version 13.0
Features:
Escape character
Method group natural type improvements
`Lock` object
Implicit indexer access in object initializers
`params` collections
ref/unsafe in iterators/async
`allows ref struct` constraint
Partial properties

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.LanguageVersion CSharp6 = int32(6)
CSharp6 = 6

Docs.summary:
C# language version 6
Features:
Using of a static class
Exception filters
Await in catch/finally blocks
Auto-property initializers
Expression-bodied methods and properties
Null-propagating operator ?.
String interpolation
nameof operator
Dictionary initializer

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.LanguageVersion CSharp7 = int32(7)
CSharp7 = 7

Docs.summary:
C# language version 7.0
Features:
Out variables
Pattern-matching
Tuples
Deconstruction
Discards
Local functions
Digit separators
Ref returns and locals
Generalized async return types
More expression-bodied members
Throw expressions

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.LanguageVersion CSharp7_1 = int32(701)
CSharp7_1 = 701

Docs.summary:
C# language version 7.1
Features:
Async Main
Default literal
Inferred tuple element names
Pattern-matching with generics

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.LanguageVersion CSharp7_2 = int32(702)
CSharp7_2 = 702

Docs.summary:
C# language version 7.2
Features:
Ref readonly
Ref and readonly structs
Ref extensions
Conditional ref operator
Private protected
Digit separators after base specifier
Non-trailing named arguments

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.LanguageVersion CSharp7_3 = int32(703)
CSharp7_3 = 703

Docs.summary:
C# language version 7.3
Features:
Indexing fixed fields does not require pinning
ref local variables may be reassigned
stackalloc arrays support initializers
More types support the fixed statement
Enhanced generic constraints
Tuples support == and !=
Attach attributes to the backing fields for auto-implemented properties
Method overload resolution improvements when arguments differ by 'in'
Extend expression variables in initializers
Improved overload candidates
New compiler options (-publicsign and -pathmap)

item.description: Indexing fixed fields does not require pinning
ref local variables may be reassigned
More types support the fixed statement
Attach attributes to the backing fields for auto-implemented properties
Method overload resolution improvements when arguments differ by 'in'

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.LanguageVersion CSharp8 = int32(800)
CSharp8 = 800

Docs.summary:
C# language version 8.0
Features:
Readonly members
Default interface methods
Pattern matching enhancements (switch expressions, property patterns, tuple patterns, and positional patterns)
Using declarations
Static local functions
Disposable ref structs
Nullable reference types
Asynchronous streams
Asynchronous disposable
Indices and ranges
Null-coalescing assignment
Unmanaged constructed types
Stackalloc in nested expressions
Enhancement of interpolated verbatim strings

item.description: Pattern matching enhancements (switch expressions, property patterns, tuple patterns, and positional patterns)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.LanguageVersion CSharp9 = int32(900)
CSharp9 = 900

Docs.summary:
C# language version 9.0
Features:
Records
Init only setters
Top-level statements
Pattern matching enhancements
Native sized integers
Function pointers
Suppress emitting localsinit flag
Target-typed new expressions
Static anonymous functions
Target-typed conditional expressions
Covariant return types
Extension GetEnumerator support for foreach loops
Lambda discard parameters
Attributes on local functions
Module initializers
New features for partial methods

item.description: Extension GetEnumerator support for foreach loops
